Text: RE Asian model calendar daysPST John Can you be my reviewer for the Performace Evaluation Process I worked on adding Asian model calendar days into PortCalc I know you are very busy But Ill have to have several reviewers from users we support Id appreciate it very much Thanks a lot Best regards Shouan Original Message From Griffith John Sent Monday April PM To Tang Shouan Subject Re Asian model calendar days The post id is Please let me know what the value is currently and then what the value is with the change Will these values be based on last nights prices volatilities skew Thanks and let me know if you have any questions John Griffith x

RE Asian model calendar daysJohn Can you be my reviewer for the Performace Evaluation Process I worked on adding Asian model calendar days into PortCalc I know you are very busy But Ill have to have several reviewers from users we support Id appreciate it very much Thanks a lot Best regards Shouan Original Message From Griffith John Sent Monday April PM To Tang Shouan Subject Re Asian model calendar days The post id is Please let me know what the value is currently and then what the value is with the change Will these values be based on last nights prices volatilities skew Thanks and let me know if you have any questions John Griffith x

RE break down of vega by dealnum for Cc attached files Shouan Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday May PM To Tang Shouan Cc Wong Jeremy McLaughlin Errol Subject Re break down of vega by dealnum for I really need to see it by month Can you pull this info by month Thanks John

RE break down of vega by dealnum for Cc attached files Shouan Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday May PM To Tang Shouan Cc Wong Jeremy McLaughlin Errol Subject Re break down of vega by dealnum for I really need to see it by month Can you pull this info by month Thanks John

RE break down of vega by dealnum for Cc attached files Shouan Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday May PM To Tang Shouan Cc Wong Jeremy McLaughlin Errol Subject Re break down of vega by dealnum for I really need to see it by month Can you pull this info by month Thanks John

forward start options testing PortCalc Test Version on deals QC and QC Cc Attached in the file are the testing results Also you can run a script file to test more PIDdeals if youd like This script file uses my modified version of PORTCALC and is on UNIX stangportcalctestcsh you can go to my home directory stang then type portcalctestcsh PID and run it Let me know if you have any questions Shouan

curve shift Cc Susan In the attached file are the valuations on for for three GD deals using the tested version of PortCalc as we discussed I did three deals out of the six deals you picked earlier basically they worked the same way Let me know if you have any questions Shouan

gas daily forward start options Modified Valuation Version Cc Susan I changed the code so that it feeds the Ostrip model as Larry requested by using the formula to derive BasisOffset In the attached file is the comparison between the old valuation and the one after the modification Please not the changes on the premiums Please let me know if you or Larry have any questionscomments on this Shouan

Re gas daily forward start options Cc Hope youve had a wonderful Thanksgiving Attached in the file are the inputs to the option models for the two deals Please let me know if you have any questions Shouan Susan M CT AM To Jeremy CT cc Shouan nron Subject gas daily forward start options Here are a couple of deals to look at Q and Q Thanks Susan
Re nov supportTry the file RegionalPipeOptionsxls in the dropbox Let me know whether it works Shouan
novPlease see the attached file I got to leave if you have any questions Ill answer it first thing tomorrow mornning Shouan

final version hopefully Cc Ive modified the code This time it works as you requested the results on deal Q is shown in the attached file You can run a script file to recalculate the book or PID The script file uses my modified version of PORTCALC and is on UNIX stangportcalctestcsh you can go to my home directory stang then type portcalctestcsh PID I can show you how to do it if you need any help or give me a call Shouan

Modified valuation for Prior day position on Nov Cc the code so that when valuated on Nov the Oct position is the same as being valuated on Oct as with the case of Nov vs Nov In the attached file please see the results for Deal Q
